name: This is the End of the Line For Mew!
name_original: This is the End of the Line For Mew!
description:
Dash! Draw! Destroy!  Get BEEG n' CHONKY!

(and probably clip out of things, so try to avoid that if you can)

Made for the Brackeys Jam 2023

Theme: "An End is a New Beginning"

Right Click - Dash 

Left Click  - Destroy previous line and hold to start drawing a new one!

A weird mashup of Katamari, Cat-lateral Damage, and Kirby Canvas Curse.

Music:

Also Sprach Zarathustra

S31 - On Patrol

S31 - Internal Reflection

poinl - TitleY
